phrases: I am responsible for the area just above yours, Riko!
Well, at least help me carry the Relics on the way home, then.
Well, today my haul needs to receive the highest valuation out of all the Red Whistles!
This area's mostly been searched already...
and there is not much anything rare left.
That is why it is going to come down to quantity!
How about fudging the numbers... with that thing you swiped the other day?
It guides its user toward the truth of the Abyss, after all.
Besides... if it is found out I was hiding it...
I will get a worse punishment this time than being strung up naked.
Talk about traumatizing a little girl!
Ah, it already went out of sight...
I wish I could ride it.
Say... is not it kind of quiet today?
Probably'because there are not any hammerbeaks around...
I cannot hear them singing at all, anyway.
Well, should make it easier to work.
Those guys take anything shiny back to their nests, after all.
Why are you going on ahead of me?!
I am the one who takes the lead!
I am going to go all out excavating today!
I will get so much stuff Leader will be at a loss for words!
I am going to get the number one assessment!
A skeleton of someone in prayer.
First time I have seen one in quite a while, so it came as a shock.
At this rate, it is only a matter of time until I am bumped up to the 600-meter group.
Where did he run off to...?
What is it doing this far up?!
I think... maybe somebody saved me.
Never seen anything like this before!
Must have been moving until a moment ago.
But, where did this boy come from?
Nat, just a bit more to go!
The hardest part is just starting now!
Oh, it is just you, Shiggy.
But, for the time being I am calling him robot boy.
So you swiped something again, Riko, huh?
I am just sheltering him, okay!
Either way is fine by me...
Ah, I knew she would be there.
Director, we are back home now.
How are we going to get past her?
I think we can manage it.
How many times do I need to tell you?!
Do not read books out on the veranda!
Drop it again and I will take it away!
You did not manage to excavate all that much, but it was the first time working solo for most of you...
so that is only to be expected.
I will have you base yourselves at the same site 100 meters down and continue working.
Those of you who lost their equipment, file a request with General Affairs.
Now, a word from the director.
There is just one thing I want to say.
Realize that your possession of a whistle is based on being a student of the guild's orphanage.
so as not to shame your parents who fell so nobly.
Helping yourself to Relics is strictly forbidden.
Relics provide valuable income to the orphanage...
I do not want to hear any complaints!
Next time, it will not stop at just being strung up naked.
Can I talk to you for a sec?
Nat tells me he lost his backpack due to being attacked by a crimson splitjaw...
If I did not save him, he would be snake droppings right about now.
I blew my whistle like so and made myself a decoy!
Well, how did you get saved, then?
A light like none I have ever seen just-
I was just about to start talking about the robot boy...
Even at a relatively safe 100 meters, you never know what is going to happen...
From now on, do not let your guard down.
I have a favor to ask!
Please assign me to somewhere deeper!
I thought I told you I would consider it if your haul was assessed to be the most valuable!
First, develop some skills that allow you to cave-raid more efficiently.
I want to become a White Whistle as soon as I can... and catch up with my mother!
I will go down as deep as she has and-
To begin with, if you were to go down 400 meters with your current level of experience,
simply heading back up again would be all you could handle!
For the time being, keep your head down and work hard.
That is too bad, Miss Saved-My-Life!
Eavesdropping like that is not cool!
More importantly, Riko, what are you going to do about that thing in your room?
I will wake him up, of course.
We have got to hurry and wake him!
I think maybe he moved a little.
Maybe we should try turning up the power a little bit?
Maybe we should try turning up the power a little bit?
I will sleep... a bit longer...
I will sleep... a bit longer...
I will sleep... a bit longer...
So, Shiggy, can I press it now?
Riko, is not it actually set on 20?
I told you that electricity would do the trick!
And who was the one who fed him hot coals earlier?
Hey, hey, Robot Boy, do you recognize me?
How did you attack that snake from so far away?
Ah, but first, tell me your name!
Hey, do not get carried away!
I feel bad about replying to a question with a question, but...
There is something I want to ask...
Do you guys work as torturers?
Riko's room is actually an old execution chamber.
She got up to too much mischief and was moved here.
Anyway, we work as cave raiders.
Well, strictly speaking, we are apprentices called Red Whistles.
Hey, hey, Robot Boy, what is your name?
What kind of stuff can you do?
It is been on my mind for a bit now, but...
And there is not a single scratch on you!
So, uh... you do not even remember that you are a robot?
Maybe that jolt of electricity messed with his memory?
The lights are out throughout the whole orphanage!
I think we overdid it by going full throttle earlier.
Leader is headed straight over here!
How does he know it was us?!
Probably'because you are always pulling stuff.
Suppose we have got to get that off you first...
I have got a bad feeling...
Do not come out of there!
We will be in a world of trouble if you do!
So, what the heck did you do this time?
Ah, m-more importantly, I just banged my foot.
Caught it at a bad angle, too.
I bumped it just the wrong way...
So this here is Shiggy's handiwork?
Once again, no idea what he is up to...
Hey, do you have anything to say for yourself?
I will not do it again.
I know you are frustrated given that your cave raiding did not go so well...
That said, there is simply no sense in causing a blackout at the orphanage.
Before I hear your explanation for this mess,
I think I will have you clean the orphanage and write a sincere apology.
If he was to find me here, there would be hell to pay...
I have got an extending metal arm...
Does a robot really need a belly button?
D-do I need this thing, too?
I took the chance to sneak away when Shiggy and the others got caught.
You getting all dressed up in front of the mirror?
What are we going to do?!
We need to get outta here!
Does not look like things are going to calm down anytime soon.
Reg, there is something I have been wanting to show you.
Not having one is pretty inconvenient, right?
So what do you think of the name Reg?
I do not mind it, but... how did you come up with it, anyway?
It was the name of a dog I used to have.
It is almost time now, Reg!
Reg, this is the city all of us live in.
The city of the great pit.
Reg, you have even forgotten about the Abyss?!
This great pit is called the Abyss.
And I found you in the depths of the Abyss!
maybe you came up from the bottom of the Abyss, Reg!
I mean, I have never seen any kind of robot like you before!
That is got to be right!
You must have come from the bottom of the Abyss, which no one has ever seen...
a huge pit was discovered on a remote island in the southern sea of Beoluska.
With a diameter of around 1,000 meters and a depth that is still unknown to this day,
Valuable and dangerous primeval creatures and mysterious Relics that are beyond comprehension
beckoned adventurers looking to strike it rich, which in time gave rise to a giant city.
Over the span of many years,
with a spirit of adventure for the unknown and countless legends luring them in,
the world's only remaining unexplored chasm has swallowed up a great many people.
It is known as the Abyss.
